guid.comments: string. guid, unique only within the mod. Will be turned into GUID 'mod:'+$yourModId+':'+$guid
name: Agamoto
description: Agamoto was a powerful paladin finely atune to the gods. After passing, Mages placed Agamoto's soul into a receptacle so the Paladin can continue doing good deeds even after death.
playstyleInfo: This paladin has strong magic abilities but weak defense
playstyleInfo.comments: string. flavor text describing what is good/bad at.
portraitSprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod character folder). PNG, 256x256.
medallionSprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod character folder). PNG, 192x192.
figurineSprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod character  folder). PNG, 512x768, Outline (10,243;0,0,0).
fullbodySprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod character  folder). PNG, 1024x1024, Outline (10,243;0,0,0).
tileDefaultSprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod character  folder). PNG, 256x384, Outline (10,243;0,0,0).
tileOccupiedSprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod character  folder). PNG, 256x384, Outline (10,243;0,0,0).
ownershipTokenMapPropSprite.comments: string. name of local file (local to the mod character  folder). PNG, 256x256, Outline (10,243;0,0,0).

levels.requiredXp.comments: int >= 0. At which XP this level up will be given.
levels.rewardsLevelUp.comments: (Optional) Rewards::GUID [default=EMPTY]. ID of the rewards information to be given when leveling up. Don't specify if you don't want to give a reward at that level.

levels.comments: List<CharacterLevel>. Describes XP requirements and rewards for each level.
inaneBlessings.comments: List<Blessing::GUID>. List of blessings the character is born with. Will be added to the list of available blessings.
inaneCards.comments: List<Card::GUID>. List of cards the character is born with, will be added to the deck.
uniqueInaneCardsInfo.comments: (Optional) List<Card::GUID> [default=EMPTY]. Display purpose only, shows which cards are unique to this character (compared to other characters). Those cards should appear in the list of inaneCards too.
personalOaths.comments: (Optional) List<Oath::GUID> [default=EMPTY]. List of Oaths that are unique to this character (Oaths that are marked as 'character specific').
defaultAllowedAmbientDie.comments: (Optional) int > 0 [default=1]. How many Ambient mana can the character use.
numPointsRequiredPerWound.comments: (Optional) int > 0 [default=1]. How many Healing points are required to heal 1 wound on this character.
defaultExplorationDistance.comments: (Optional) int > 0 [default=1]. How many hexes away from exploration spot can the character explore.
defaultExplorationMovementCost.comments: (Optional) int >= 0 [default=2]. How many movement points does it cost to explore (by default).
starterArmor.comments: int > 0. How much armor does the character start with.
starterHandSize.comments: int > 0. How many cards can the character hold in hand by default.
starterFollowerSlowCount.comments: int >= 0. How many followers can the character manage from the start.

dummyPlayerStartingBoons.crystalsInInventory.comments: (Optional) List<ManaColor::GUID> [default=EMPTY]. List of mana crystals the character will start with.

dummyPlayerStartingBoons.comments: CrusadeStartingBoons. Boons the dummy player starts with (typically should be N=3 crystals)

startingBoons.cards.comments: (Optional) List<Card::GUID> [default=EMPTY]. List of cards the character will start with.
startingBoons.followers.comments: (Optional) List<Follower::GUID> [default=EMPTY]. List of units the character will start with.
startingBoons.blessings.comments: (Optional) List<Blessing::GUID> [default=EMPTY]. List of skills the character will start with.
startingBoons.crystalsInInventory.comments: (Optional) List<ManaColor::GUID> [default=EMPTY]. List of mana crystals the character will start with.
startingBoons.armorBonus.comments: (Optional) int [default=0]. Can be negative. Increase/Reduce character armor.
startingBoons.handSizeBonus.comments: (Optional) int [default=0]. Can be negative. Increase/Reduce character hand size.
startingBoons.reputationBonus.comments: (Optional) int [default=0]. Can be negative. Increase/Reduce character reputation.
startingBoons.followerSlotsBonus.comments: (Optional) int >= 0 [default=0]. Increase starting number of unit slots (will add the 'units' to it too).

startingBoons.comments: (Optional) CrusadeStartingBoons [default=EMPTY]. Additional boons the character starts with (ex: crystals, followers, blessings ...)

mana.form.comments: ManaForm::int. Form of the mana (crystal, token, ...)

roundBoons.mana.comments: (Optional) List<Mana> [default=EMPTY]. List of mana that the character will receive every round.
roundBoons.reputationBonus.comments: (Optional) int [default=0]. Can be negative. Increase/Reduce character reputation every round.
roundBoons.movementPoints.comments: (Optional) int >= 0 [default=0]. Gain movement points every round.
roundBoons.healingPoints.comments: (Optional) int >= 0 [default=0]. Gain healing points every round.
roundBoons.leadershipPoints.comments: (Optional) int >= 0 [default=0]. Gain leadership points every round.

roundBoons.comments: (Optional) CrusadeRoundBoons [default=EMPTY]. Boons the character receives every round  (ex: crystals, followers, blessings, reputation, movement
